title: rAvE mAyamma
sahitya:
rAvE mAyamma rAjarAjEshvari rAjillu cuNDavE nA hrdaya kamalamulO


anupallavi

  jIvAdhAramaina cinmayAnatinI cidAkAsha narttini mahA kuNDali vardhini


caraNam    akhaNDa paripUrNa saccidAnandamaya Adi parAshakti akhilANDa nAyaki sugandha 
mandahAsa sumukha mukha vilAsa sundari svatantari nirantari shuddhAnanda hrdantari
